title: ChromaCALM Ambient Channel
summary: A generative motion identity for an ambient channel—color‑driven sequences tuned for hospitals and wellness spaces.
problem: Static loops caused fatigue in long‑stay environments. The client needed low‑variance visuals that remained soothing for hours.
solution: We built a color‑state engine with parametric motion envelopes. The system produces infinite, slow‑evolving compositions.
